casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

March, 1959

(March 4, 1959) Klara Geletucha, as Administratrix of the Estate of Antoni Geletucha, Deceased, Appellant, v. 222 Delaware Corp. et al., Defendants, and 1 Hour Dura Cleaning, Inc., Respondent.

Appeal dismissed, without costs as academic in view of the decision in the companion ease of Geletucha v. 1 Hour Dura Gleaning (7 A D 2d 315). All concur. (Appeal from an order of Erie Special Term denying plaintiff’s motion for a new trial on the ground of newly discovered evidence, after a nonsuit as to defendant 1 Hour Dura Cleaning, Inc.) Present — MeCurn, P. J., Kimball, Williams, Bastow and Halpern, JJ.
